offerAndAcceptance.offer: The first party desires to transfer money from Turkey into Syria.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: The second party agreed to facilitate these transfers.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Both parties acknowledge the objective to transfer funds for humanitarian aid.

consideration.description: Transfer of money for humanitarian purposes

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: This Agreement is intended to create legal obligations.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: The purpose of this Agreement is legal and aimed at humanitarian assistance.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: Transfer of funds for humanitarian aid
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: Commencing from the signature date, valid for a specified duration.

contract.consent: Both parties consent to the terms outlined in the contract.
contract.formAndFormalities: Any amendments must be made via mutual written consent.

durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Two weeks written notice required for premature termination.
durationAndTermination.renewalTerms: Mutual written consent required for any renewal.

signature.declaration: Signed for and on behalf of the first party
Signed for and on behalf of the second party
